hymn.title: The Living Vine, a Reality

layout.singingstanza: The liv -- ing vine, a re -- al -- i -- ty Of God and man, one or -- gan -- i -- c'lly Mu -- tual a -- bode, or -- gan -- i -- sm sweet. Ex -- pres -- sion full, min -- [skip1] gling com -- plete. Fa -- ther, Cul -- ti -- va -- tor— Hus -- band -- man, The source is He. Soil, sun -- shine and the air— Nu -- tri -- ents com -- plete. Son, the liv -- ing vine is— The em -- bod -- i -- ment of God. And the Spir -- it makes Him real— As the life juice sweet!
layout.singingstanza2: 2. When we a -- bide, there's a flow with -- in. As branch -- es we— are ex -- press -- ing Him. Our God needs us, we de -- pend on Him. To bear much fruit, to bring oth -- ers in.

hymn.notes: Stanza 3 may be used as a counter melody with Stanzas 1 and 2.

lyrics.stanza: The living vine, a reality Of God and man, one organically Mutual abode, organism sweet. Expression full, mingling complete.
When we abide, there's a flow within. As branches we—are expressing Him. Our God needs us, we depend on Him. To bear much fruit, to bring others in.
